@graph.name: Vegan Okonomiyaki - Cabbage Carrot Pancakes - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Vegan Okonomiyaki - Cabbage Carrot Pancakes. Japanese Okonomiyaki made vegan. Served with home made tonkatsu sauce.

@graph.name: Vegan Okonomiyaki - Cabbage Carrot Pancakes
@graph.description: Vegan Okonomiyaki - Cabbage Carrot Pancakes. Japanese Okonomiyaki made vegan. Served with home made tonkatsu sauce.Makes 5 to 6 pancakes
recipeIngredient: 1/8 tsp Indian black salt (kala namak- optional)
2 tsp crumbled nori sheets  (or 1/2 tsp togarashi - optional)
1 tbsp vegan worcestershire sauce  (or whatever sauce as we refer to it in my house ;))

recipeInstructions.text: Shred all the veggies. Add vinegar, and everything through nori sheets keep aside for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Shred all the veggies. Add vinegar, and everything through nori sheets keep aside for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Sifft in the flours + baking powder into the bowl and mix in. Add a little water to make a mix that can spread. You might not need much as the veggies leak a lot of water depending on how you shred them.
recipeInstructions.name: Sifft in the flours + baking powder into the bowl and mix in. Add a little water to make a mix that can spread. You might not need much as the veggies leak a lot of water depending on how you shred them.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan over medium heat, add oil. Spread the batter to even it out into 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick pancake and cook for 5 to 7 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a pan over medium heat, add oil. Spread the batter to even it out into 1/4 to 1/2 inch thick pancake and cook for 5 to 7 minutes per side.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with the tonkatsu sauce, vegan mayo and pickled ginger if you have some.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with the tonkatsu sauce, vegan mayo and pickled ginger if you have some.

recipeInstructions.text: Tonkatsu sauce: Mix all the ingredients until well combined and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Tonkatsu sauce: Mix all the ingredients until well combined and serve.
